verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And they sang the song of Moses, The servant of God and the song of the Lamb Saying, “Great and marvelous Are Thy works Lord God Almighty, Just and true are Thy ways{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh King of Nations who will not fear Thee Oh Lord and glorify Thy Name For Thou only art holy, For all nations shall come and worship before Thee For Thy righteous acts have been revealed.”{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hallelujah, oh hallelujah, Hallelujah, oh hallelujah, hallelujah.{/lang-eng}
